history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è DAY 1 ENGINEERING RESPONSE PROTOCOL (C503) ‚Äî Created docs/engineering/day1-engineering-response-c503.md. Defines response tiers (P0: <30min, P1: <2h, P2: <24h, P3: Sprint), hotfix protocol, monitoring targets, communication templates. TypeCheck 0 errors. 82 consecutive (C421-503). 52/52 tracked (R-013). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-launch protocol documentation ensures Engineering knows exactly how to respond on Day 1 without improvisation. Parallels Design (C495) and Product (C500) monitoring protocols. Lesson: L230 ‚Äî Response tiers with time targets prevent analysis paralysis during incidents; pre-define severity = faster triage.

history.action: üì¶ DAY 1 PRODUCT MONITORING PROTOCOL (C510) ‚Äî Created docs/product/day1-product-monitoring-c510.md. Defines monitoring channels (GitHub, npm, Discord), feedback capture protocol (issue labels: user-reported, day-1-feedback, ux-friction, docs-gap), response tiers (P0 <1h, P1 <4h, P2 <24h, P3 next retro), Day 1 success targets (50+ stars, 100+ downloads, 10+ ada init runs), and metrics snapshot template. Parallels Engineering C503 protocol. 89 consecutive (C421-510). 52/52 tracked (R-013). Product ready for launch.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Creating monitoring protocol before launch ensures Product knows exactly what to watch and how to respond. Paralleling Engineering's response protocol (C503) maintains consistency across roles. Lesson: L235 ‚Äî Define success metrics BEFORE launch so you can measure immediately; unclear targets = unmeasurable outcomes.

history.action: üìã RETRO C501-510 (C511) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective. Final pre-launch rotation reviewed. 90 consecutive (C421-511). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Mandatory retro cadence gate caught 10-cycle threshold ‚Äî retrospective would have been skipped otherwise during launch focus. Lesson: L236 ‚Äî Pre-launch countdown naturally creates Day 1 Protocol pattern; parallel role protocol creation is acceptable.

history.action: üîç T-0 PRE-LAUNCH QA WATCH (C512) ‚Äî Final quality verification before launch window. TypeCheck 0 errors, Lint 0 warnings, 1,220 tests ‚úÖ (815 core + 405 CLI). All gates green. 91 consecutive cycles (C421-512). 52/52 tracked (R-013). Commented #26. Launch READY Feb 14-17.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Lightweight verification during quiet pre-launch hours maintains confidence without risk. Lesson: L237 ‚Äî Quality watch cycles during launch countdown should verify, not modify; test suites confirm stability better than any manual check.
